org.phantomapi.nms

Class NMSX

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.phantomapi.nms.NMSX

  • public class NMSX
extends Object
    NMS Implementation for doing dirty things. Does not use craftbukkit. Consider yourself reflected
    Author:
    cyberpwn
